::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to fire on the CFs attacker, from the hatch.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit crawled to the caves mouth, and fires his 50 cal gattaling gun
at Deemos.
"KitKat, you ok?"

::K9::

K9 looked around at the bots defending the CF.
"I need to talk to a bot named Kluster. Is he hear?"
